ROOT_FOLDER_HINT: The absolute path to the folder containing your TV Shows
AUTORENAME: Autorename subtitles files to match video file name
AUTORENAME_EXT: Add the language extension to the file name (xxx.en.srt)
USERNAME_HINT: A username to protect the access to the application (optional)
UPDATE_MSG: An update of the application is available: version {{last.name}}. Your current version is version {{current}}. Update now.
UPDATE_CONFIRM: Are you sure that you want to update the application ?
UPDATE_ERROR: The update has failed. Error message : {{ err }}
